sense.def:
A type of something
je skupina stvari, ki imajo določene skupne lastnosti.

seg.quote: They usually test your blood type during pregnancy.

sense.def:
Izraz
a type
uporabimo za nekaj, kadar na tisto gledamo v primerjavi z drugimi stvarmi, ki imajo podobne lastnosti.

seg.quote: How much longer can you do this type of work?

sense.def:
A particular type of person
je oseba z določenim videzom ali lastnostmi.

seg.quote: He was good-looking, if you like the strong, dark type.

sense.def:
To type something
pomeni nekaj napisati na računalnik ali pisalni stroj.

seg.quote: I had to do some typing for her.

sense.def:
To type information into a computer or word processor
pomeni s tipkovnico vnesti podatke v računalnik.

seg.quote: The letter was typed into a word processor.

sense.def:
To type up a handwritten text
pomeni besedilo, ki je napisano na roko, napisati še na računalnik ali pisalni stroj.

seg.quote: After thinking about it, she typed it up, then we both read it.
